FOGGING AND MISTING OPERATION IN THE CAMPUS
September 12, 2022
DISINFECTION CONDUCTED BY DOH IN THE CAMPUS September 20, 2022
PHOTO DOCUMENTATION NSTP 2 – National Service Training Program Second Semester, AY 2019 – 2020

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus 235-7997 www.cvsu.edu.ph
Green the Bottle + Save the Mother Earth Webinar was held at Cavite State University -
Tanza Campus, April 29, 2022 through online Webex
The program started with the opening remarks by the host speaker, Ms. Gerry Mae
Silvero. As she greeted and welcome all the participants of the webinar, she introduced NSTP
Facilitator, Ms. Estie Viela, who hope that all the participants will inspires to save the Mother Earth
by planting and using recyclable materials and she also introduced the resource speaker, a, Ms.
Honey Joy N. Mojares.
The speaker started to discuss the bottle gardening. She discussed the different types of
usage of plastic bottles such as Plastic Bottles Bertcal Garden Ideas, Plastic Bottles on Walls,
Tower Garden, Vertical Herb Garden, Hang Bottles with Strings, Bottle Ladder, Upside Down
Bottle Tower, on the Shelf, and more.
She also explains that not all plastic bottles are safe to use in planning. Because some
are harmful and release toxins into the soil, especially when heated, exposed to sunlight or
exposed for extended periods of time.
Moreover, she talked about applying fertilizers and different examples of it, such as
compost, manure, carbonized rice hull, and vermicast. Lastly, the speaker clarifies the benefits of
bottle gardening.
Ended discussion, with the cohost, Ms. Gerry Mae Silverio, moderated the question and
answer portion. Many students were asked for their queries, as Ms. Mojares answered each.
